name: InfiniBall Jump
description:
In "Infiniball Jump!" your objective is to jump your way to complete as many levels as possible before time runs out!

In your quest to improve your jumping skills you can use powerups and collect new balls with special skills in exchange for the coins you get while playing!

It's still in beta stage so you can help by sending suggestions and bug reports in the comments!

UPDATE 1.6 final: added two new balls, fixed known bugs, new accelemeter based controls, made startup faster
